text_block_list.text:
While Special Week is out running, I<n>spend some time
thinking about what<n>to do next.

She's lost sight of her dream to<n>become the number one
racer in all of<n>Japan. What should I do as her<n>trainer to get
her back on the right<n>track?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... Oh, Trainer?! Wereyou waiting for me this whole time?!But it's already so late...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Go out? Where to?
choice_data_list: The place of your hopes and dreams!
The place of your hopes and dreams!

text_block_list.text: (Yeahhhh!)

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
In first place is Silence Suzuka! She's<n>so fast that the other
contestants<n>can't even keep up with her shadow!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wooow!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
She's amazing! Like super-duper<n>amazing! Are you seeing
this?! Look<n>at Suzuka go! My eyes can't get<n>enough of
her running!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
And listen to the crowd roar! Hehe,<n>they're making my ears
ring!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
This is incredible! The Twinkle Series<n>really is somethin'
else!
choice_data_list:
Since when did you want to run in the Twinkle
Series?

Since when did you want to run in the Twinkle
Series?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Uh... good question. I'm not sure,<n>actually. I've always
wanted to run in<n>the Twinkle Series, so it's hard for<n>me
pinpoint an exact time...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wait, I think I remember!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Back when I was just four years old,<n>my mom and I were
out for a drive,<n>and we saw this old lady who looked<n>like
she was really struggling.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I think she might have had an illness,<n>and it was flaring up.
We wanted to<n>call a hospital, but there weren't any<n>
phones nearby.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
So I just ran to the nearest clinic as<n>fast as my legs would
allow!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
The doctor did everything to help the<n>old lady, and she got
better without<n>any major problems.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
At first, my mom got mad at me for<n>running off all alone, but
after that, she<n>gave me a biiig hug.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: She told me she was proud of me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah. She said, "You're my—ourpride." She also said that she's sohappy to see that I'm growing up tobe healthy and dependable.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Right... That's when I realized that I<n>wanted to run even
faster and<n>become an even better person!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I only had one thing in mind: to<n>become the best version of
myself.<n>That's why...

Right then, I see the twinkle in her<n>eyes that I had seen
when we first<n>met, and her hopes and dreams come<n>alive
once more.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And now, today's final race! The last<n>show on the greatest
of stages, the<n>Twinkle Series! Who will seize victory<n>and
take home the event's crown?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, can I ask you a favor? I want<n>to have another go at
partner racing<n>with El and Grass.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Please!
The following day...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... Is that all yougot, Spe?! Then I guess I'll be takingfirst place!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Spe...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (My body is still freezing up...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(I still get scared whenever I think of<n>what happened then...
All I want is to<n>get along with everybody and have<n>fun!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I don't want my friends to not like<n>me!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (But still...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hraaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Yeah, Spe! Hehe, now that's what<n>I'm talking about!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: But the race isn't over just yet!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(That's right... If I want to win, I have<n>to run! Run fast! Run
hard! That's why<n>I'm here in the first place!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (I know we're friends, and I want myfriends to like me! But... if I want tobecome a person that makes people proud, I need to... No, I will run!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

All three girls give it everything<n>they've got, locked in a tight
race until<n>the finish.

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... pant...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Gracias, Spe!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Gra...tin? What?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
It means "thank you"! Spe, thanks for<n>giving it your all.
Because of that, I<n>was able to give it my best too!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
When we compete against each other<n>with everything
we've got, it allows<n>us to take our running further! It<n>
allows us to grow! So muchas<n>gracias, Spe!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Let's make sure to give it our allwhen we compete—as friendsand as rivals! Let's keep honingour skills and polishing our abilities!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: El! ...Yeah, yeah! You're right!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... Hey, Spe! That girl over there...<n>She's been watching
you for a while<n>now. I think she has something to say<n>to
you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Who? Oh!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text: Um... I'm sorry, Spe. I don't know<n>what got into me...

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
I was in bad shape, so I panicked and<n>took out my anger on
you... I shouldn't<n>have been so mean! I'm sorry!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry about it. Water under the<n>bridge! So don't cry,
okay?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But instead, promise me that next<n>time we race, we do it fair
and square!<n>If you win, you can make your debut!<n>I'm not
going to hold back, though!

text_block_list.name: Spe's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, Spe... Okay! I'm gonna train<n>lots and lots so I can
beat you at your<n>best!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Heheh... I can't wait! Let's both giveit our all—as rivals and as friends!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, thanks for everything. You<n>reminded me of why I
run.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
As long as I have you and my friends,<n>I'm sure I'll be able
to keep on<n>running. One day, I'll reach my goal of<n>
becoming Japan's number one racer!
(Gurgle...)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, my! Spe... Is that what I think it is?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Bwahahahaha! Talk about perfect<n>timing!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Not you too! This is so embarrassing...
